resources.string: Welcome to Asteroid Evader, thank you for downloading. This app has been constructed as a portfolio piece to demonstrate my Android and Unity development skills. The Unity game has been integrated into the Android app so that I can utilise features from both Unity and Android. For example any score achieved in the game will be stored in the App\'s room database. From this project I have learnt much about the potential capabilities of combining Android and Unity.
From this tab you can launch the Asteroid Evader game, and view your high score.
